post.body: Gonna give plasma & do laundry 2day...got the day off. Need it after customer from the pit last night...working double shift tomorrow.
Gonna hang out w/ Michele and Jennifer then going to a friend's house for dinner 2nite. Should be fun. Off work til Sat unless called in.
John Maxwell: Succesful people forget. The past is irrevokale. I can't control what happens to me, only what happens in me.
If 'your call is important to us' is true, and if 'we put our customers first', there is no reason for over thirty minutes wait time!
Steven Furtick: If someone can walk away from you, let them walk. Your destiny is never connected to those who leave.
Enjoying an early thanskgiving dinner...
Bras...periods...bowel movements...protection...the conversations people've been having around me today are way over the top.
Michele needs to chill w/ the incessant twitters...'you need to relax'
About to go into a interview with Raising Cane's...not really a job I want necessarily, but they're the only ppl I've heard from...
Furtick: Often ur promotion to the next level of ur walk with God or your leadership will feel like a demotion rather than an advancement.
Throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover. (Mark Twain)
Some people make it just impossible to watch TV!
Been a bad day thus far...taking the rest of the day off and trusting that God has a plan for all this even if I don't see it right now.
Just watched the dumbest movie I've ever seen!!! Zombie mutant sheep attacking ppl & turning them 2 sheep. And someone said this was good?
McManus: The cynic, the pessimist, can only live in the past or take up space in the present. Only the believer can create the future.
Brewster: Rarely is the problem a lack of ideas, its a lack of execution. Complaining & excuses r not ability issues, they're desire issues.
Stevenfurtick.com - Nothing is more vital to accomplishing the purpose of God for your life than a spirit of resolve...Let nothing move you.
Over two hours in line, but the vote's cast...didn't expect that wait...
On our 1st break...then, we get started training....tons of paperwork so far.
Starting a new job today...collections...we'll see. Leaving here to close at Cane's. Should be fun!
Drinking a latte & watching a interview w/ Joyce Meyer & Dr. Smalley..relationships need safety more than nething else. Own ur own emotions.
Yesterday, they wanted me to come late to avoid OT...now they've called me in early...guess more OT this wk. Works for me...
Scheduled 4:30-8...wonder what time ill actually get off?
There's something seriously wrong wth needing A/C in your car on Christmas...
Merry Christmas everyone!
Working 11-3...will be in OT again this week. Just have to avoid making it snow inside... The things I should have been told in training...
23.5 hrs in 2 days...wow!
Working 11:30-10 today...may get off early though...long day ahead.
Long day ahead...took lafe 2 airport, going to work, pick ron up then back to work til close...non stop from 10am til probably 11:30 or ...
